Text:
Thanks for upping this. Brilliant short from a brilliant studio. This is by the same talented folks who made the amazing Royksopp "Remind Me" music video and lots of other very amazing stuff. Check them out: http://www.h5.fr/

I would love to see (and buy) this on Blu-Ray. Can you imagine it in HD? I doubt it will ever happen :-(
